alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Hyde; Martin; Tyrrell; Washington (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 8:30PM EDT until June 17 at 9:15PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Newport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Washington County in eastern North Carolina... Northwestern Hyde County in eastern North Carolina... East central Martin County in eastern North Carolina... Northeastern Beaufort County in eastern North Carolina... West central Tyrrell County in eastern North Carolina... * Until 915 PM EDT. * At 830 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Plymouth, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Plymouth, Ponzer, Pike Road, Wenona, Hinson, Leechville, Westover, Pleasant Grove, Scuppernong, Phelps Lake, Pungo Lake, Mackeys, Roper, Creswell and Dardens. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please send your reports of hail and/or wind damage, including trees or large limbs downed, by calling the National Weather Service office in Newport at 1-800-889-6889.
